titleStmt.title: A short and plain narrative of Matthew Coker, touching some mistakes and mis-recitals in a pamphlet of this day, intituled Certain passages of every days intelligence, &c. In reference to his gift of healing; which is herein clearly evidenced, in several remarkable instances.
titleStmt.author: Coker, Matthew.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
